name: Zenaton Samples - Simple ETL
description: This example Zenaton project showcases how to extract, transform, and load data from a source to a destination.

ZENATON_APP_ID.description: The Zenaton Application ID (find it on https://app.zenaton.com/api)

ZENATON_API_TOKEN.description: The Zenaton API token (find it on https://app.zenaton.com/api)

GOOGLE_CREDENTIALS.description: Content of your Google Credentials JSON file
